Class EReaderController

  • java.lang.Object
    • EReaderController

  • public class EReaderController
extends java.lang.Object
    Controller interface for EReader application. Interacts with Model.
    Author:
    Ali Hamza, Sultan Alnhari, Jack Guerin

      • openFile

        public void openFile(java.lang.String bookName)
        This method is used by the controller to interact with the model and open a file in the library/model and set the file as book in the library.
        Parameters:
        bookName, - String representation of a new book to add to library.

      • getNext

        public void getNext()
        This method is used by the controller to interact with the library/model and the library's current displayed book to turn the current displayed book's to the next page.

      • getPrev

        public void getPrev()
        This method is used by the controller to interact with the library/model and the library's current displayed book to turn the current displayed book's to the previous page.

      • openBook

        public void openBook(java.lang.String fileName)
        This method is used by the controller to interact with the library/model and the library's current displayed book to turn the current displayed book's to the first page.
        Parameters:
        fileName - is a string representing the book to open.

      • getProgress

        public double getProgress()
        Returns the overall progress of the current book's page versus its overall contents.
        Returns:
        double between 0.0-1.0 to represent overall progress.

      • bookNotFoundss

        public boolean bookNotFoundss()
        Returns:
        return true if the book is spelled wrong and not valid.

      • containsBook

        public boolean containsBook(java.lang.String fileName)
        Checks if a book is contained in the library model.
        Parameters:
        String - fileName represents the file name of the book.
        Returns:
        returns true if book is contained in library and false if not.
